title: Bug 6125 - JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When attempting to create a JAR file, the packager reports 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5' after clicking the 'Finish' button.
OB: After clicking the 'Finish' button to create a JAR file, the packager reports 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5'.
EB: After clicking the 'Finish' button to create a JAR file, the packager should not report 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5'. Instead, it should successfully create the JAR file without any error messages.
SR:
1. Open the packager in the application.
2. Add files to be included in the JAR file.
3. Click the 'Finish' button to create the JAR file.
4. Check if the packager reports 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5'.
